statements: SELECT survey_id, survey_date, latitude, longitude, altitude, crop_type FROM GeospatialData;
SELECT drone_id, survey_date, crop_type, altitude, latitude, longitude FROM GeospatialData;
SELECT latitude, survey_date, drone_id, altitude, crop_type, survey_id FROM GeospatialData;
SELECT survey_date, crop_type, drone_id FROM GeospatialData WHERE altitude > 100;
SELECT survey_date, drone_id, altitude, crop_type FROM GeospatialData WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, latitude, longitude, crop_type FROM GeospatialData WHERE drone_id = '49c4aa41-7fd3-4b56-9126-c87cc0d8e4b6'
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, crop_type FROM GeospatialData WHERE altitude > 1000 AND latitude BETWEEN -90 AND -80
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, crop_type FROM GeospatialData ORDER BY survey_date DESC, latitude ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM GeospatialData WHERE survey_date >= '2022-01-01' AND survey_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT survey_id, drone_id, altitude FROM GeospatialData WHERE crop_type LIKE '%corn%' ORDER BY altitude DESC
SELECT * FROM drones_surveys;
SELECT survey_id, captured_area, survey_date FROM drones_surveys ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT survey_id, drone_id, captured_area FROM drones_surveys WHERE captured_area > 1000;
SELECT * FROM crop_monitoring WHERE health_status IS NULL;
SELECT monitoring_id, crop_type, growth_status FROM crop_monitoring ORDER BY monitoring_id;
SELECT * FROM drones_surveys ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT survey_id, drone_id, captured_area FROM drones_surveys WHERE drone_id = 3;
SELECT survey_id, drone_id, survey_date FROM drones_surveys WHERE captured_area > 1000 ORDER BY survey_date ASC;
SELECT monitoring_id, crop_type, growth_status FROM crop_monitoring WHERE health_status = 'good';
SELECT monitoring_id, crop_type, crop_location FROM crop_monitoring WHERE ST_Y(crop_location) < 50 AND crop_type = 'corn';
SELECT * FROM DroneSurvey ORDER BY survey_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT survey_name, survey_area_km2 FROM DroneSurvey WHERE survey_area_km2 > 5.0;
SELECT * FROM SurveyImage WHERE image_resolution_dpi >= 300 ORDER BY image_timestamp ASC;
SELECT field_name, crop_type FROM CropField WHERE cultivation_status = 'Fertile' ORDER BY field_area_km2 DESC;
SELECT id, drone_model, survey_duration_minutes FROM DroneSurvey WHERE survey_date >= '2022-01-01' AND survey_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM DroneSurvey ORDER BY survey_date DESC, survey_area_km2 ASC;
SELECT survey_name, drone_model FROM DroneSurvey WHERE survey_duration_minutes > 60 AND drone_model = 'DJI Mavic Pro';
SELECT survey_name, survey_area_km2, survey_date FROM DroneSurvey WHERE survey_date >= '2022-01-01' AND survey_area_km2 > 5 ORDER BY survey_area_km2 DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyImage JOIN DroneSurvey ON SurveyImage.survey_id = DroneSurvey.id WHERE SurveyImage.image_resolution_dpi > 300 ORDER BY SurveyImage.image_timestamp DESC;
SELECT field_name, crop_type, planting_date FROM CropField WHERE cultivation_status = 'Ready' ORDER BY planting_date ASC, field_area_km2 DESC;
SELECT * FROM DroneSurveys;
SELECT survey_id, drone_model, area_covered FROM DroneSurveys WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_id, survey_date FROM DroneSurveys ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CropTypes WHERE growth_duration > 90;
SELECT mapping_id, crop_name, mapped_area FROM FieldMappings JOIN CropTypes ON FieldMappings.crop_id = CropTypes.crop_id;
SELECT * FROM DroneSurveys;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, drone_model FROM DroneSurveys WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_id, area_covered, survey_data FROM DroneSurveys ORDER BY area_covered DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyImages WHERE image_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT cm.survey_id, cm.crop_id, ct.crop_name FROM FieldMappings cm JOIN CropTypes ct ON cm.crop_id = ct.crop_id WHERE cm.mapping_date < '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM survey_area;
SELECT id, name, location FROM survey_area ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, area_size, location FROM survey_area WHERE area_size > 100;
SELECT * FROM drone_data WHERE altitude < 5000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, crop_name, yield_per_area FROM crop_data ORDER BY yield_per_area ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_area ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, area_size FROM survey_area WHERE area_size > 1000 AND name LIKE '%field%' ORDER BY area_size ASC;
SELECT drone_id, start_timestamp, end_timestamp FROM flight_path WHERE drone_id = 3 AND start_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM map_tile WHERE ST_DWithin(map_area, 'POINT(-73.985 40.748)', 0.1);
SELECT crop_name, harvest_timestamp FROM crop_data WHERE yield_per_area > 50 ORDER BY harvest_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
